Kinger, the Alliance base is a few miles out to sea, now at the IF.


::The Alliance Base/Zardus/Demolition/Havoc/DevilDuer::

Zardus flies up to the shields of the Iron Fist, looking around. It 
was an excellent location for a base, an island several miles away 
from the mainland. He smiles, thinking about the military advantage.

It was excellent. The Iron Fist's shields covered the whole island, 
which was a few hundred feet across. The shields would need to be 
taken down in order to gain entry, but it would have to be done by 
air troops, as ground troops would be forced to swim the three miles 
to the island, making an easy target for the defences. In adition, if 
a bot aproached underwater, the Iron Fist and island defences would 
release energon nets, or send powerful electric shocks through the 
waters, frying the approaching bot.

If a bot managed to get through the shields somehow, he would be a 
much easier target to the defences. Multiple missile launchers and 
laser turrets lined the ship, and the Iron Fist's main turret (the 
one Panzertron demonstrated to Megatron) stood out on top.

Zardus' smile broadens, the Alliance commander, remembering that the 
inside of the ship was filled with halls and rooms containing state 
of the ark Predacon technology: labs, weapons, everything.

"Shields down," he says into his wrist comp, the shields of the Iron 
Fist lowering. Zardus lands near the open hatch, entering the ship.

Behind him, the shuttles carrying the Alliance base arrive and land, 
the Alliance base combining again in the middle of the island. 
Demolition lands and enters behind Zardus, carrying Delta, and Havoc 
behind him, carrying Feline's body parts.

"Follow me," Zardus says, heading down the corridor to the labs. Two 
shuttles launched out of the Iron Fist's docking bay, flying toward 
the mainland to pick up any Alliance troops going by foot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer nearly falls as the Alliance base lands, grabbing onto a 
doorway to keep his balance.

"We're at our destination!" he says to Vamprah, "Wanna go outside see 
where we are?"
